segments.text: I notice the sun shining brightly through that open window, illuminating everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet here in the kitchen, it feels like a storm is brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her plate that the water cascading down the cabinets escapes her notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s in her own world, untouched by the unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can barely stand to watch the boy teetering on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every muscle in my body tenses as he reaches further for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a dangerous game he’s playing, and the girl looks so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm raised, she gazes up at him like it’s the most important moment of her life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they fully grasp the trouble they’re courting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why are they risking so much for a cookie?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s just a simple treat, yet they seem to think it’s worth the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen, usually a haven, feels like a trap right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I could stand here forever, just watching and waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s mesmerizing and terrifying all at once, this little slice of life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake the feeling that something’s about to give.
segments.speaker: PAR
